definition: Yongle Emperor, reign name of third Ming emperor Zhu Di 朱棣[Zhu1 Di4] (1360-1424), reigned 1403-1424, Temple name 明成祖[Ming2 Cheng2 zu3]
eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
Zhou Yongkang (1942-), PRC petroleum engineer and politician
Yong'an county level city in Sanming 三明[San1 ming2], Fujian/Yong'an or Yung'an township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Yongzhou prefecture level city in Hunan
Yonghe or Yungho city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Yongkang county level city in Jinhua 金華|金华[Jin1 hua2], Zhejiang/Yungkang city in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
Yongchuan suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
to get sth done once and for all

sentences.english: Introduce:Nylon tyre cord fabric, motorcycles, napkin machine, bearings.
sentences.chinese: 輪胎永簾子布，摩托車，柔巾機，軸承。

sentences.english: Using the rope as a slide, Chien-Po helped the Emperor to safety.
sentences.chinese: 他們永繩索做了一個滑梯，把皇帝救到安全的地方。

sentences.english: As is, this wing would be great for kiting or ground handling practice.
sentences.chinese: 正如，這將是永放風箏或地勤的做法很好。

sentences.english: Me, Forever will also belong to our story extension go down.
sentences.chinese: 涐，永逺亦將屬箊涐們旳故亊延續落去。

sentences.english: If I see you next to never , how can we say forever.
sentences.chinese: 假如你不能再回還，豈能相約永相愛。

sentences.english: The process never ends; it constantly moves back upon itself to go forward.
sentences.chinese: 這過程永無止盡，總是週而復始的繼續向前。

sentences.english: It shall be a heap forever. It shall not be built again.
sentences.chinese: 那城就永爲荒堆，不可再建造。

sentences.english: Where there is no tomorrow any more, yesterday is always there.
sentences.chinese: 到最後再沒有明天時，昨天也是永在的。

sentences.english: Tan sits as chairman of both Fortune Tobacco and the new venture.
sentences.chinese: 陳永栽爲福川菸草和新合資公司的主席。

sentences.english: " EC Chuan practicing strokes from the "Wing" to the beginning of eight law.
sentences.chinese: 統傳練筆畫從“永”字八法開始。

sentences.english: This show has a place in television history that we will never forget.
sentences.chinese: 這部劇集正成爲電視史上令人永難忘懷篇章。

sentences.english: But Andrea and I are eating at (Wing Lei) three out of seven nights a week.
sentences.chinese: 我和安德烈一週7個晚上得有3個晚上是在永雷喫的。

sentences.english: And tongues to be, your being shall rehearse.
sentences.chinese: 未來的舌頭也會將你永傳誦。

sentences.english: Finding may lead to never-dull tools study says.
sentences.chinese: 研究者稱，該發現可能促進研發永不變鈍的工具。

sentences.english: The smell of the other always in the quilt.
sentences.chinese: 被子下兩人的氣息永在。

sentences.english: Each expert was given improved corn varieties when leaving.
sentences.chinese: 離開永順時，每位專家均獲贈了玉米良種。

definition: to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
